title: My Shadow Book
description: "Poets are the unacknowledged legislators of the world." - Percy ShelleyWhat if we told you Shelley was right? What if there were a cabal of ancient, interdimensional, supernatural men and women who have enabled human progress over generations? What if they've been creating, in darkness and in light, to save us all?Join novelist and literary scholar, Jordan A. Rothacker, as he shares his discovery of Maawaam, a Shadow Man, and a secret society of Shadow Men and Women who have been with humanity since the dawn of time. Will Rothacker uncover the source of Maawaam's power? Or will the answers within his Shadow Book drive Rothacker mad?When knowledge literally equals power, the shadows become more appealing than the light...
author: Jordan A. Rothacker
